entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Digby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:43 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Snow at times mixed with rain this evening. Snowfall amount 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 then north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
